text: Aleksandr Apollonovich Shavlokhov (, born in 1939 Labyrinth.ru: Profile of Aleksandr Apollonovich ShavlokhovWorldstatesmen.org: South Ossetia) is a South Ossetian politician. He was the Prime Minister, from 1996 until August 1998. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of South Ossetia
title: Aleksandr Shavlokhov
